version_description:
V. 4.52
We messed up. We removed wake up sounds you love. So we've brought them back and added 5 new tunes with the help of producer Robo-Mopho.

We've also fixed a ton of bugs that really sucked. Wake N Shake is now working beautifully.

Details:
- Fixes scroll bug
- Volume fade-in
- Fixed max volume bug
- Other improvements
Yo guys, we messed up, and let the app get nasty buggy. We've killed most of the issues. More fixes and tweaks on the way.
Fixed some bugs and UI issues.

Introducing Power Mornings by Wake N Shake — A weekly morning routine guaranteed to zap you into action every morning. What you do right after you wake up defines your day. Start the day with energy to conquer anything!

Just shake once to sign up.

Also:
- Fresh new icon to reflect our new power philosophy
- Lots of bug fixes for improved performance

Introducing Power Mornings by Wake N Shake — A weekly morning routine guaranteed to zap you into action every morning. What you do right after you wake up defines your day. Start the day with energy to conquer anything!

On the third triggered alarm, you'll be able to sign up.

Also:
- Fresh new icon to reflect our new power philosophy
- Lots of bug fixes for improved performance

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

We've squashed some bugs.
